name: Six | Half | Dozen : Design Studio
tagline: Washington Graphic and Web Design Studio
description:
We put a huge emphasis on branding companies consistently throughout all their marketing materials.
Both in print, and online, we consistently design advertisements, brochures, displays, flyers, websites, e-blasts, informational graphics, reports, and publications for our clients.
We work closely with them in a collaborative effort, especially during the first few projects, to ensure we get to know the client, their projects and their target audience.
